page.title: 01OUR D BLOCK
page.content: Our D-block consists of the residential outskirts of Maryport;one large former mining village-Dearham;and farms.Most pupils in our school do not live in the D-block and some of surveys involved households outside the D-block.This we could not help in the time allowed. We have surveyed the land and found plenty of evidence of former industry such as mining;as well as current social behaviour. newspapers recreation homelife farming industry religion railways local history sport landscape and buildings
